mapper.insert: insert into core.health_id ( id, h_id, status, location_id, created_date )values ( nextval('health_id_seq'), #{hId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
